Package server.remote

Class PlayerRemote

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
      • java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
        • java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
          • server.remote.PlayerRemote
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IPlayerRemote, java.io.Serializable, java.rmi.Remote
    public class PlayerRemote
extends java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
implements IPlayerRemote
    This class will handle all method callable by the client (other than model manipulation)
    See Also:
